exec: pm.test("Response contains an ID for the assignment", function () {
pm.test("Response contains a resource object with ID and resource_type", function () {
pm.test("Each resource_type contains an ID and a name", function () {
pm.test("Each resource_type contains a unit_of_measure object with ID and name", function () {

request.description:
**Endpoint**: POST /Time_control

**Description**: Returns ResourceAssignment

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/time-control/assignements

**Method**: POST

**Parameters (Body):**

- resource_type_id (Int32, Mandatory)
- name (String, Mandatory)
- description (String, optional)
    

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/time-control/assignements' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "resource_type_id":100,
    "name":"Consultant",
    "description":"prueba"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 1000000,
    "resource": {
        "id": 100,
        "resource_type": {
            "id": 100,
            "value": "Consultant",
            "name": "Consultant",
            "description": "",
            "unit_of_measure": {
                "id": 101,
                "code": "HR",
                "symbol": "h  ",
                "name": "Hora",
                "description": "",
                "standard_precision": 2,
                "costing_precision": 2
            }
        },
        "name": "Mary Consultant"
    },
    "name": "Consultant",
    "description": "",
    "assign_date_from": "2024-03-07T18:37:08Z",
    "is_confirmed": false,
    "quantity": "0"
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- there is no data
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Organization",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- the name is missing
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  &Name",
    "details": []
}

 ```

- resource type id missing
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Fill mandatory fields:  Resource Type",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

            "quantity": "3"
        },
        {
            "id": 101,
            "resource": {

                    "id": 100,

                    "description": "",

response.name: ListResourcesAssignment

request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /Payment

**Description**: Returns ResourceAssignment

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/time-control/assignements/{id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Parameters (Body)**

name (String, optional)

description (String, optional)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request PUT 'http://api.adempiere.io/time-control/assignements/1000001/confirm' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data '{
    "name":"qwe",
    "description":"prueba"
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "id": 100,
    "resource": {
        "id": 100,
        "resource_type": {
            "id": 100,
            "value": "Consultant",
            "name": "Consultant",
            "description": "",
            "unit_of_measure": {
                "id": 101,
                "code": "HR",
                "symbol": "h  ",
                "name": "Hora",
                "description": "",
                "standard_precision": 2,
                "costing_precision": 2
            }
        },
        "name": "Mary Consultant"
    },
    "name": "qwe",
    "description": "",
    "assign_date_from": "2003-02-05T14:00:00Z",
    "assign_date_to": "2003-02-05T17:00:00Z",
    "is_confirmed": false,
    "quantity": "3"
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- the resource is not active or not found
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Resource is not available or not active",
    "details": []
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: DELETE /Payment

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/info/open-items/payments

**Method**: DELETE

**Parameters (Params):**

id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location --request DELETE 'http://api.adempiere.io/time-control/assignements/1000001' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTQ5IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjowLCJBRF9Sb2xlX0lEIjoxMDIsIkFEX1VzZXJfSUQiOjEwMCwiTV9XYXJlaG91c2VfSUQiOjAsIkFEX0xhbmd1YWdlIjoiZW5fVVMiLCJpYXQiOjE3MTA1MTA0MDEsImV4cCI6MTcxMDU5NjgwMX0.nYQbrcT9RyHNRCf-oNM50ZVSO6uJ9gvrQQ7e0fzU9Ik' \
--data ''

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

**Endpoint**: POST /Time_control
